name: TypeScript Production Quality
description: Production standards for TypeScript with strict type checking

code_style.naming: camelCase for variables, PascalCase for classes

prompts.code_generation:
Generate production-quality TypeScript code for: {task}

REQUIREMENTS:
- JSDoc for all public functions
- Strict TypeScript types, no 'any'
- Proper error handling
- Unit tests with Jest/Vitest
- Prefer const, no var

OUTPUT CODE ONLY.
